## Introductions

-   Name

-   Major in College (Emphasis)

-   Fun Fact

-   What class do you want to teach?

# Data Science

## What is Data Science?

![](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/r2I3IDKwyMw/maxresdefault.jpg)

## Statistics

- Knowing how to apply mathematical models to data
- Understand the data generating process (probability theory)
- Construction of statistical estimators to model data

## Simple Model

For a sample $\{X_i, Y_i\}^n_{i=1}$, we claim that

$$
Y_i = \beta_0 + \beta_1 X_i + \epsilon_i
$$

- $\beta_0$, $\beta_1$: Regression Coefficients
- $\epsilon_i$: Error term

## Goal

Construct

$$
\hat Y_i = \hat\beta_0 + \hat \beta_1 X_i
$$

## Coding

This is the process of handling large amounts of data for analysis. This includes:

- Data Collection
- Data Storage
- Data Cleaning
- Analysis

## Size of Data

With the ease of collecting data, large amounts of data are being collected (> 1 GB)

## Domain Knowledge

***The most crucial part!***

Not knowing how a scientific fields collect data, or the lack of knowledge, can lead faulty results.

# Teaching Data Science

## How do you teach mathematics?

## What do you need to teach Data Science?

## Where do you learn data science?

- Online Tutorials
- Books
  -   https://r4ds.hadley.nz/
  -   https://wesmckinney.com/book/
  -   https://www.statlearning.com/
  -   https://tellingstorieswithdata.com/
  -   https://m408.inqs.info/books.html
    - Get the Springer books

## Conducting Data Science Projects

- https://archive.ics.uci.edu/

## Learn how science is conducted.

- Read scientific articles.
- Read on reproducible research.

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
